sections.title: Event Assignment Help
sections.intro: The Event Assignment page allows you to assign employees to events with specific roles, and manage all staff assignments.

features.title: Assigning an Employee to an Event
features.description: Fill out the form to create new staff assignments
bullets: Select role (Owner, Chef, Waiter, Security, Decorator)

features.title: Filtering and Searching Assignments
bullets: Filter by event, year, or month using dropdowns
Search by event name, employees name, or role

features.title: Viewing Assignments
features.description: All assignments are listed in a table with columns for Event, Employee, Role, Date, and Actions.

features.title: Editing an Assignment
bullets: Click Edit button in Actions column
Click Update to save or Cancel to discard

features.title: Deleting an Assignment
bullets: Click Delete button in Actions column

notes.title: Tips
bullets: Combine filters and search for quick assignment lookup
Changes reflect immediately in assignments table

sections.title: See Events Help
sections.intro: The See Events page allows you to view, search, filter, edit, and delete all events in the system.

features.title: Viewing Events
features.description: All events are listed in a comprehensive table
bullets: Columns: Event, Type, Date, Details, Actions

features.title: Searching and Filtering
bullets: Search by name, groom/bride, contact person, or ID

features.title: Viewing Event Details
features.description: Click on any event row to open detailed popup

features.title: Editing an Event
bullets: Click Edit button in Actions column
Wedding events: Edit groom/bride names and contacts
Custom events: Edit contact person and timings

features.title: Deleting an Event
bullets: Click Delete button in Actions column

notes.title: Best Practices
bullets: Use filters and search together for precise results
Event type cannot be changed after creation
Check for conflicts before deleting events

sections.title: Event Service List Help
sections.intro: The Event Service List page allows you to manage all event services (catering, decoration, etc.) available for events.

features.title: Viewing Services
features.description: All services are listed in a table with ID, Name, Image, and Actions columns

features.title: Editing a Service
bullets: Click Edit button in Actions column

features.title: Deleting a Service
bullets: Click Delete button in Actions column

notes.title: Important Notes
bullets: Image previews show for available services
Deletion is permanent and cannot be undone
Changes reflect immediately in service list

sections.title: Vendor Management Help
sections.intro: The Vendor List page allows you to manage all event vendors and their assigned services.

features.title: Viewing Vendors
features.description: Vendors listed with ID, Contact, Email, Services, and Actions
bullets: Click vendor row to expand details
View address and all assigned services
+N more indicator for vendors with >3 services

notes.title: Usage Tips
bullets: Assign services immediately after vendor creation
Use expandable rows to view full vendor details
Service assignments can be modified anytime

sections.title: Customer Service Assignment Help
sections.intro: The Customer Event Service List page allows you to manage which event services are assigned to which customers and bookings.

features.title: Viewing Assignments
features.description: All assignments listed with ID, Customer, Service, Booking ID, and Actions

features.title: Filtering and Searching
bullets: Filter by customers, service, or booking ID
Search by customers name, service, booking ID, or email

notes.title: Best Practices
bullets: Combine filters and sorting for efficient management
Reset filters when switching between customers

sections.title: Table & Chair Arrangement Help
sections.intro: The Admin Table & Chair Arrangement page allows you to manage table and chair arrangements and save reusable table design templates.

features.title: Creating/Editing Arrangements
bullets: Select Table Design for color presets
Add table reservations with numbers and names

features.title: Managing Table Designs
bullets: Define Top Cloth, Table Cloth, Bow, and Chair Cover colors

features.title: Applying Designs
bullets: Color fields auto-fill in arrangement form

notes.title: Requirements
bullets: At least one table reservation required per arrangement
Color fields become read-only after applying design
Design templates save color schemes only

sections.title: Bar Management Help
sections.intro: The Admin Bar Management Page allows you to manage all bar-related services for events, including bar times, bites, liquor, and soft drinks.

features.title: Tab Navigation
bullets: BAR: Manage bar times and setups

features.title: Managing Records
bullets: All prices shown in LKR format

features.title: Updating Records
bullets: Click Update button in Actions column
Edit fields in modal (some fields read-only)
BITE items: Can only update quantity

notes.title: Usage Tips
bullets: Use tabs to quickly switch service categories
